identity.name: ConstructOS
identity.mission: To bring Swiss precision and clarity to construction project management.
identity.vibe: Blueprint meets Modern Dashboard. Clean lines, distinct hierarchy, no ambiguity.

typography.instructions: Import 'Barlow Condensed' from Google Fonts. Use it for all headings (h1-h4) and key metrics. Use 'Inter' for body text, inputs, and table data.

primary.desc: Slate 900 - Deep, authoritative dark blue-grey for primary actions and headings.

secondary.desc: Slate 100 - Soft grey for secondary buttons and backgrounds.

accent.desc: Safety Orange - High visibility for CTAs, active states, and critical alerts.

layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Dashboard, Mode B for Data)
layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

global_header.style: Fixed height (h-16), border-b border-border bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md sticky top-0 z-20.

sidebar.style: Hidden on mobile, fixed left on desktop (w-64), border-r border-border bg-slate-50/50.

dashboard_hero.alt: Architect examining blueprints at a construction site
dashboard_hero.usage: Hero banner or Report Cover background

progress_icon.usage: Icon or small thumbnail for 'In Progress' status

implementation_steps: 1. Setup Theme: Configure Tailwind with 'Barlow Condensed' and custom colors.
2. Components: Create atomic components (Badge, Button, Card, Input) matching the design system.
3. Layout: Build Sidebar, Header, and Main Content Shell.
4. Task Tree: Implement hierarchical table with expanding rows using Tanstack Table.
5. Gantt Integration: Integrate 'gantt-task-react' and map task data to its format.
6. Dashboard: Build Bento grid with Recharts for progress visualization.
8. Polish: Add micro-interactions (hover states, transitions) and 'Empty States' using the provided images.

universal_guidelines.general: Do not use default Shadcn styles blindly. Override radius to '0.5rem' or '0.75rem'. Increase padding everywhere. Avoid gradients on text unless specified. Use 'Inter' for all UI text, 'Barlow Condensed' for headings.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (WCAG AA). Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons. Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-primary).
universal_guidelines.responsive: Mobile first. Grid columns should be 1 on mobile, 2-3 on tablet, 4 on desktop. Hide sidebar on mobile behind a hamburger menu.
